q1: Can I customize the watermark appearance?
a1: Yes! You can set the watermark text, font size (12-120px), opacity (5-80%), and rotation angle (-90° to 90°). The watermark is centered on each page.
q2: Is the watermark added to all pages?
a2: Yes, the watermark is applied to every page of the PDF document automatically.
a3: All processing happens in your browser. Your files never leave your device.
